channel.title: linux on Josef Erben's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in linux on Josef Erben's Blog

item.title: Thinkpad T14 with NixOS and I3WM
item.description: 3 months ago I installed NixOS, i3wm and XFCE on my new Thinkpad T14 (1st Gen). It is my main machine that I use every day. In this blog post I summarize my experience with this setup.

item.title: How to Generate Random Strings on Linux in One Line
item.description: With following command you can print a random string of a certain length on Linux. tr -dc A-Za-z0-9 </dev/urandom | head -c <length> ; echo '' The string is safe to use in most web contexts such as HTML forms or environment variables.

item.title: Autostart Dropbox on NixOS using I3WM
item.description: Install Dropbox using NixOS in your preferred way.
